resources:
MobileInsight Widget Demo Steps 1. Press and hold any empty space on the home screen to choose Widgets. 2. Selcet a widget from the MI Widget list and drag to the home screen. 3. Repeat Step 2 if you want more widgets. 4. Run MobileInsight and the corresponding demo plugin (See Widget Intro). 5. Go back to the home screen. The widget will show results. Info This app provides a set of widgets to visualize the runtime network information from MobileInsight.

The code is hosted on GitHub (https://github.com/mobile-insight/mobileinsight-widgetdemo).

© Copyright 2014-2017, MobileInsight Team.

Show state transitions for LTE EMM.

Corresponding pulgins:

Work with NasAnalysis to show live state transitions.

Work with Demo-NAS-offline to show state transitions in replayed log.

Show state transitions for LTE ESM.

Corresponding pulgins:

Work with NasAnalysis to show live state transitions.

Work with Demo-NAS-offline to show state transitions in replayed log.

Show state transitions for LTE RRC.

Corresponding pulgins:

Work with RrcAnalysis to show live state transitions.

Work with Demo-RRC-4G-offline to show state transitions in replayed log.

Show state transitions for WCDMA MM.

Corresponding pulgins:

Work with NasAnalysis to show live state transitions.

Work with Demo-NAS-offline to show state transitions in replayed log.

Demo-Mobilgraph-offline

Show state transitions for WCDMA GMM.

Corresponding pulgins:

Work with NasAnalysis to show live state transitions.

Work with Demo-NAS-offline to show state transitions in replayed log.

Show state transitions for WCDMA RRC.

Corresponding pulgins:

Work with RrcAnalysis to show live state transitions.

Work with Demo-RRC-3G-offline to show state transitions in replayed log.

Show state transitions in NAS and RRC for both LTE and WCDMA, including LTE RRC, LTE EMM, LTE ESM, WCDMA RRC, WCDMA MM, WCDMA GMM.

Corresponding pulgins:

Work with NasAnalysis or RrcAnalysis to show live state transitions.

Work with Demo-NAS-offline to show state transitions in replayed log.

Show mobility information, including handoff comands, measurement control information and measurement reports.

Corresponding pulgins:

Work with Demo-Mobilgraph-online to show live mobility information.

Work with Demo-Mobilgraph-offline to show statistics in replayed log.

Show LTE bandwidth and modulation scheme for both uplink and downlink physical channel.

Corresponding pulgins:

Work with Demo-PHY-online to show live physical bandwidth.

Work with Demo-PHY-offline to show statistics in replayed log.
